CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 27, 1941, pg. 4, reads: "Engaged - Mr. and Mrs. J.S. Sterling of Harmonsburg, Pa., formerly of Pittsburgh, announce the engagement of their daughter, Valeria Marcella, to Paul Harrison Jones, son of Mr. and Mrs. Webster Jones of Meadville, Pa. An early spring wedding is planned. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Valeria Marcella Sterling wearing dark short sleeved dress with lace collar and cuffs, posed seated in front of light colored circular background in Harris Studio
